title: October 30, 2019: Maker (MKR): Down 1.58%
text:
Maker: What’s the Latest Regarding its Price?

Maker’s current price, at the time of this writing, is $528.52 USD, down by approximately 1.58% from the day prior. The down day for Maker yesterday was a reversal from the day before it, which puts its price at 5.5% above its 20 day moving average. Over the past two weeks, price has been in an up trend. In terms of an expected trading range, the Bollinger bands on Maker suggest price may bounce between $450.9561 and $550.9549 based on its momentum and volatility over the past 14 days. Price’s current proximity to the top of the range may make shorting an attractive opportunity to traders interested in trading the range.

Trade Maker (MKR) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

The market capitalization of Maker, or the amount of US dollars it would take to buy up all the circulating coins, is currently estimated to be $525 million.

Daily Engagement Metrics Update

Over the past 24 hours, no transfers have been added to the blockchain recording transactions amongst holders of Maker. Regarding a tally of holders, Yesterday saw Maker’s wallet count decline by 30. Our engagement rank, which combines weekly percentage growth in number of holders and number of transfers, has Maker ranked 2 out of the 34 Ethereum tokens we’re tracking.

Observing Maker’s Richest Wallets

The top 1,000 Maker wallets hold over 98.39% of the token’s total money supply. The percent of the currency that is owned by wallets that are both belonging to exchanges and in the top 1,000 richest wallets of the token comes out to 0.93% of the currency’s money supply. In terms of growth rates, the share of total supply of the richest 1,000 wallets has grown by 0% over the past week. For the exchange wallets within the richest 1,000 wallets, their share has grown by -0.01%. Maker’s smart contract owns approximately 0.08% of its own total money supply. This amount hasn’t changed over the past week.

How Active are the Software Developers?

Maker has been active recently on its GitHub repos, with its most recent code updates occurring today, October 30, 2019. Growth rates for open issues — a “”to-do list”” of sorts and watchers (“”subscribers”” following a code repository) for Maker are growing by 0.47 and 0.23, respectively, over the past 30 days.

The Latest on Maker and Social Media

Social media growth, in terms of Twitter followers and Reddit subscribers, came in at up 135 and 10 over the past day for Maker. Traders interested in following Maker has the biggest presence on Twitter, where it has 32,394 users engaged. Here is the Twitter page for Maker.

Where to Buy

You can trade Maker, listed under the symbol MKR, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, DDEX, Ethfinex.

Article by SixJupiter
